ISSUE.TITLE: MAIN_DIRECT_STATUS_UPDATE has failed on v18.0.3
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Bug The quick status button for product are not working on v 18.0.3 sine i just upgrade from 16.0.5 . ### Environment Version 18.0.3 ### Environment OS Debian 4.19.67-2+deb10u2 ### Environment Web server Apache/2.4.38 (Debian) ### Environment PHP 7.4.3 ### Environment Database MariaDB 5.5.5-10.3.39 ### Environment URL(s) /product/card.php?id=550 ### Expected and actual behavior Should could change status of product by click quick button . ### Steps to reproduce the behavior _No response_ ### Attached files _No response_
